prompts: Create a dragon Pokemon with vibrant blue skin and a striking red head.
I want a bipedal Pokemon that features sharp claws and a fierce demeanor.
Generate a Pokemon that combines elements of both dragon and rock types.
Make a powerful dragon-like creature with a muscular build and large wings.
Imagine a Pokemon with a rugged appearance, perfect for mountainous terrains.
Design a Pokemon that embodies strength and resilience, equipped with a spiky back.
Show me a creature that thrives in various habitats, from mountains to urban areas.
